content: click here for free pattern tutorial ** labubu pouch 1 ** craft something practical and adorable its a pouch featuring the popular labubu if you re a beginner searching for an easy pattern a fan of crochet bags and pouches or simply like me love labubu this tutorial is perfect for you what do you think of a mini labubu pouch big enough for your airpods that can double up as a cute bag charm join us as we guide you through the entire process of making a labubu pouch bag from start to finish with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll have your own mini labubu pouch in no time whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out you ll find this labubu pouch tutorial project both enjoyable and rewarding you will need * yarn - any light pastel color or any labubu color and beige a small amount of black white and the darker version of the pastel color you are using * small amounts of felt in black and white * crochet hook * yarn needle * stitch markers * strong glue or hot glue i use 4ply milk cotton yarn and a 3mm hook if you want your mini labubu pouch to be the same size as mine use any yarn that can fit well on a 3mm/no 5 hook in this tutorial you ll learn * how to crochet a mini labubu pouch * step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals ✨ why you ll love this tutorial * full crochet mini labubu pouch bag free * clear easy-to-follow instructions * high-quality close-up visuals to guide you through each step * a fun and rewarding project that would make a great gift 1 https //youtu be/fx1gmdwtkzi
